name: Panther's Claw
flavorText: “Brother Fyntana commissioned this weapon to replace the hand he lost in his storied quest to rid the Aranoch of the Lacuni. It is said that bits of the panther men he killed were incorporated in its construction.” - Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani
flavorTextHtml: “Brother Fyntana commissioned this weapon to replace the hand he lost in his storied quest to rid the Aranoch of the Lacuni. It is said that bits of the panther men he killed were incorporated in its construction.” - Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani
